statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price <= 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 20 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity >= 30 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND price < 200 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, item_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC, price DESC
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 OR quantity > 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC

SELECT inventory.id, inventory.item_name, inventory.quantity, inventory.price, inventory_index.index_name FROM inventory JOIN inventory_index ON inventory.id = inventory_index.id WHERE inventory.quantity * inventory.price > 100 ORDER BY inventory.item_name ASC
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM Product
SELECT id, quantity, location FROM Inventory
SELECT id, name, address FROM Location
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT id, name, price, category FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';

SELECT Inventory.id, Product.name, Location.address FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Product ON Inventory.product_id = Product.id INNER JOIN Location ON Inventory.location = Location.id WHERE Product.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory;

SELECT Location.name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Product ON Inventory.product_id = Product.id INNER JOIN Location ON Inventory.location = Location.id GROUP BY Location.name HAVING avg_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 10.00;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.product_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, total_price, product_id FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Supplier WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT id, location_name FROM Location WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE category_name LIKE '%electronics%';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Supplier WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT location_name, address FROM Location WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransaction WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
